vehicles.description: In the left lane, there is a white car traveling in the same direction, about three car lengths ahead of our vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: The position and movement of a white car may affect the speed of our vehicle and the following distance, so it is necessary to pay attention to maintaining a safe gap.

vehicles.description: A white car is driving in the left lane on the opposite side of the road.
vehicles.explanation: This vehicle is not an object of urgent attention because it is on the other side of the road, separated by a median, and travels in the same direction as the traffic on that side.

vulnerable_road_users.description: Ahead on the right side of the road, there is a group of workers wearing orange high-visibility jackets, with a handcart beside them.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Workers are near the roadway, posing a potential hazard; therefore, autonomous vehicles must be prepared to slow down or stop at any time.

traffic cones.description: Workers on the road have placed several orange traffic cones around them, indicating some form of work or obstruction.
traffic cones.explanation: These cone-shaped markers indicate the area where workers are present and may signify lane closures or warnings that motorists must heed.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the scene observed, there are two vehicles and a group of vulnerable road users. On the left lane, there's a white car traveling in the same direction, positioned about three car lengths ahead of our vehicle, which requires attention to maintain a safe following distance. Another white car is spotted in the left lane but on the opposite side of the road, proceeding in the direction of traffic there, which doesn't demand immediate focus since it's separated by a median.

Additionally, ahead on the right side, a group of workers wearing orange high-visibility jackets can be seen, accompanied by a handcart. This group is close to the driving path which might present a safety risk. As a result, it is essential for autonomous vehicles to be prepared to reduce speed or come to a stop to avoid any accidents.

In relation to the workers, there are several orange traffic cones placed around the work area. These cones serve as indicators of potential work or obstacles on the road and could imply that there are lane closures or other cautions that drivers must observe.

There are no traffic signs, traffic lights, barriers, or other objects reported in this scenario.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe following distance behind the white SUV, while also keeping an eye on its speed and behavior. When changing lanes, be vigilant of any potential movements from the white sedan in the neighboring lane. Be prepared to slow down as you approach the workers and traffic cones on the right side ahead, and drive carefully. If necessary, be ready to stop at any time. Follow the traffic sign instructions and do not enter the area on the right side. Overall, respect the road construction zones, drive cautiously, and stay alert to the surrounding traffic.

3.description and explanation: This object appears to be a non-motorized vehicle, possibly a pedicab or tricycle, used for transporting goods. Given its slow speed and size, the ego car must maintain a safe distance and be prepared to overtake when it's safe to do so, respecting any lane change rules and right-of-way.
